# Import Code
```text

```

# Installation
In Streamer.bot in select `Import` from the top left.
Copy the `Import Code` and paste it into the `Import String`. 

![audio-source-toggle-import.png](/extensions/audio-source-monitor-toggle/images/audio-source-toggle-import.png)

# Configuration
Change the `Argument` `%audioSource%` to your audio and assign the `Action` to a hotkey/command/button of your preference.
![audio-source-toggle-argument.png](/extensions/audio-source-monitor-toggle/images/audio-source-toggle-argument.png)

>You can make copies of this `Action` to make toggles for all your audio sources.
{.is-info}
